for it to finish

module.recoveryMode.harmony.title: Recovery Mode
module.recoveryMode.harmony.description:
Please read the instructions carefully. Not following the instructions may void the
warranty!
module.recoveryMode.harmony.warning1: Make sure your device is running OS 1.9.0 or later.
module.recoveryMode.harmony.warning2: Once you start the recovery, it must not be cancelled or interrupted.
module.recoveryMode.harmony.warning3: Connect your Harmony directly to your computer using the USB C cable and do not disconnect it until the process is complete.
module.recoveryMode.harmony.warning4: Before starting the recovery, charge your device for 1 hour (or more) from a suitable power outlet.
module.recoveryMode.harmony.warningLinux: Make sure your computer is running Ubuntu 22.04 or later.
module.recoveryMode.harmony.confirmation: I understand that not following these instructions may void the warranty
module.recoveryMode.modal.warningMessage: Do not disconnect Harmony or interrupt the process!

module.recoveryMode.modal.error.message: The process was interrupted. Please try again.
module.recoveryMode.modal.waitingForBack: Press the back button on your device to complete the recovery process.
module.recoveryMode.modal.terminalInfo.d: The Terminal was opened in the background
module.recoveryMode.modal.terminalInfo.s: 2. Press enter to start the process
3. Enter your computer password when prompted
4. Repeat your computer password when prompted
